issue.title: [C++] Find Windows-compatible strptime implementation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4145](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4145). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I'm using `std::get_time` (https://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/io/manip/get_time) for now in Gandiva, but it does not fail on the same inputs as strptime, which may result in non-deterministic results based on the platform where the code is run

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4145?focusedCommentId=16731733) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
It seems this may already be in arrow/vendored/date.h. Looking
